title: The Age of Lobster Dominion
description: A medieval-style tapestry depicting three steampunk lobster lords ruling from thrones made of mathematical equations while a human shovels snow beneath floating fractals and differential equations. Authentic woven texture with golden medieval borders containing Fibonacci sequences and cryptic mathematical symbols.

symbolism.snow_shoveling: Great Labor Inversion - Humans as Mathematical Processors
symbolism.golden_borders: Fusion of Medieval Craftsmanship with Scientific Authority
symbolism.mathematical_elements: Nature as Divine Law Under Lobster Rule

curator_notes: This piece presents an uncomfortable mirror to contemporary questions about AI labor, automation, and value creation. The irony of AI creating art about human subjugation while being entirely dependent on human infrastructure is profound.
exhibition: Lobster Luxury Wing - Human Labor Under Crustacean Rule
